p: Ten bacterial strains from American Type Culture Collection (ATCC, Rockville, MD, USA) were used for tests: Bacillus cereus ATCC 10876, Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633, Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538p, Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213, Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300 (MRSA), Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212, Escherichia coli ATCC 25922, Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 19883, Acinetobacter baumanni ATCC 19606, Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853. Seven Candida species from ATCC were used for antifungal tests: Candida albicans ATCC 10231, Candida albicans ATCC 24433, Candida albicans ATCC 90028, Candida guilliermondii ATCC 6260, Candida glabrata ATCC 15126, Candida krusei ATCC 14243, Candida kefyr ATCC 204093.
